content:
Final Quarter of 2023 - Launch

End November 2023 - App Launch: We kickstart with the app launch, featuring the first set of indicators, notification features, and webhook capabilities.

December 2023 - Weekly Token Sales Commence: Starting as soon as we hit 500 active users, continuing over the course of four years, weekly sales of 10,000 RAKER tokens will be conducted. The funds generated will be channelled towards further feature development and platform enhancement.
